entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain or a few wet flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Snow level rising to 1200 metres this morning. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Snow level 1200 metres. Fog patches developing this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 14 January 2023
